item.title: Santiago Gimenez Ocano
item.description: About I have over 10 years of experience in information security and I am a Senior Security Engineer. My work focusses on Web Application Security, Authentication, Penetration Testing, Network Security, and Applied Cryptography. I have a bachelor’s degree in Telecommunication Engineering, and a Master of Science Degree in Computer Science. Also, I have the following certifications: CISSP, OSCP, CEH, and Security+. I hold a SAINTCON Hackers Challenge black badge.
